servercountryflags.servermap.title: Server Map
servercountryflags.config.field.flagPosi: Changes the flags' positions. Available options: default, left, right, behindName
servercountryflags.config.field.reloadOn: Forces flags to be reloaded when the server list is refreshed
servercountryflags.config.field.showDist: Shows the approximate distance between the server and you when you hover over a flag
servercountryflags.config.field.forceEng: Forces the API results to be in English instead of your in-game language
servercountryflags.config.field.displayU: Displays the unknown flag when we don't have data about the server yet
servercountryflags.config.field.displayC: Displays a timeout flag when we have an API cooldown
servercountryflags.config.field.showDist: Shows the district of the location too, if available
Shows the ISP of the host, if available
servercountryflags.config.field.mapButto: Shows a map button in the server list which opens the server map
Map Button on the Right Side
Decides whether the map button should be on the right side or the left side
servercountryflags.config.field.showHome: Shows your location on the server map too
servercountryflags.config.field.resolveR: Uses the redirected IP (if present) instead of just the resolved IP
servercountryflags.config.field.serverBr: Displays flags in the Server Browser, if that mod is installed
